tweet: We just published our first @Cardano Plutus Programming tutorial.   We used Playground created by @InputOutputHK. We wish to build this portal into an important resource for Cardano development.  Get your hands dirty programming Cardano:   https://t.co/Cd55DMGLs5

To be crystal clear, this means: whoever had ada in a @Ledger wallet at the time of the snapshot (12.00 UTC on November 29, 2019), they can now also take part in the #Cardano incentivized testnet. That is wonderful, thank you @YoroiWallet / @emurgo_io

$ADA #Cardano   Wow!   Despite seeing 17M from IOHK be re-delegated to another pool, POA has almost recovered the total stake at the time the IOHK funds were moved!   Additionally, we have seen the number of delegator increase by 500%!   This is exactly the result we strive for!

our #hrms pool isn't, and won't be in the future, running more than one node with the same leader key! we are trying our best to maximise rewards for our delegators without harming the network and causing adversarial forks! #trustyouroperator #cardano #ada $ada #heremespool
